title: Probe launched into hidden camera found in women’s bathroom at tuition class
content: Police are conducting an investigation into the incident where a camera was found hidden inside the women’s bathroom of a popular tuition class in Gampaha.The mother of a female student who had attended the tuition class in question had lodged a complaint with Gampaha Police regarding the incident.Acting on the complaint, police officers had arrived at the location to carry out investigations and recovered the camera hidden inside the women’s toilet.
